text: Jan Krister Allan Henriksson (born 12 November 1946) is a Swedish actor. He is best known for playing Kurt Wallander in the television movies based on the novels by Henning Mankell. He was born in Grisslehamn, Sweden. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors
title: Krister Henriksson
